name: I/O Extended 2017 Mombasa
description:
I/O Extended events include a variety of options for developers—from live streaming sessions to local demos, hackathons, codelabs, and more. These events are hosted in your neighborhood by local developer communities.

#io17 #ioextended2017

name: GDG DevFest 17 Mombasa

venue.name: Jomo kenyatta university of Agriculture and Technology

description:
GDG DevFest are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, code labs, and more. Our sole aims of GDG Devfest 17 Mombasa is to provide multi speaker sessions and a codelab on areas our gdg members are excited to follow on; Android, Firebase & Android Things.

We shall also host a session on Women Techmakers to increase female participation within the community and to motivate more women into technology.

We are targeting many attendees to come out from one of our largest communities in the region, Mombasa tech Community who have interests and passion on Google Developer Technologies.

#devfest #android #androidthings #firebase

name: Google Developer Days Extended - Mombasa
description:
Google Developer Days (GDD) are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow & retain an active user base, and tap into tools to earn more.

The 2017 GDD Codelabs will be online once the event starts on 5 September. 

#GDDEurope #GDDExtended #GDDExtendedMombasa

name: Mobile Site Certification Study Jam - Mombasa
description:
As you know, web is one of our core technology pillars. A key way of educating our community and spreading know how on key technologies like mobile speed, PWA, AMP and web payments is through the Mobile Site Certification Study Jam.

Mobile Sites Certification takes around half a day. It’s a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who show proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development and is evaluated with multiple choice. The Mobile Sites certification exam is designed to test your knowledge of mobile website development. You'll need to pass the Mobile Sites exam to become certified in Mobile Sites.

name: Cloud Study Jam Mombasa

venue.name: Jomo kenyatta university of Agriculture and Technology

description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
At the event we’ll use a tool called “Qwiklabs,” a Google training product. If you have used Qwiklabs before, great! Make sure you know your password. If you have never used Qwiklabs before, save time by creating an account for yourself prior to the class at: https://google.qwiklabs.com/users/sign_up (creating an account is free). At the event we will give you a link that gives you one month of free Qwiklabs access.

• What to bring
1. Laptop -- Mac, PC, Chromebook, Linux, everyone’s welcome.
2. Laptop charger.
3. The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, use Firefox or Chrome.

• Important to know
Looking forward to seeing you at the event!

name: Build Actions for Your Community
description:
• What we'll do
Build Actions for Your Community is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. A Learning opportunity to developers to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for the community. This way, we can build something in our area that developers care about or are interested in. #buildactions #GoogleAssistant

• What to bring
- Laptop

• Important to know
Google Event Community Guidelines: https://www.google.com/events/policy/anti-harassmentpolicy.html

name: IWD 2018 Mombasa
description: Women Techmakers Mombasa powered by GDG Mombasa will be hosting a one day event packed with inventive and memorable moments. The event will entail lightning talks, speed geeking sessions as well as a female panel session focusing on technical and non-technical topics. The purpose of the event is to appreciate women in the field of STEM

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Mombasa

venue.name: Jomo kenyatta university of Agriculture and Technology

description:
TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

As a complement to large tech talks ad viewing party events that you may already be hosting, the Machine Learning Study jam Framework brings together a small group of your members who are interested in learning about Machine Learning

description:

Build Actions for Your Community is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. name: I/O Extended 2018 Mombasa

venue.name: Jomo kenyatta university of Agriculture and Technology

description:
• What we'll do
Google I/O brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at Google’s latest developer products. Google I/O is for developers—the creative coders who are building what’s next. Together we’ll explore the latest in tech, mobile, and beyond. I/O Extended events include a variety of options for developers—from live streaming sessions to local demos, to hackathons, codelabs, and more.

• What to bring
Passion to learn Google Technologies

• Important to know

name: Next '18 Extended Mombasa
description:
Next ’18 is a three day global exhibition of inspiration, innovation, and education where we learn from one another how the cloud can transform how we work and power everyone’s successes.

The leading minds in cloud, including Google executives, partners, and customers, will take the stage to inspire, educate, and power the cloud forward in real time. All keynotes will be live streamed at our event.

What to bring:
- Laptop
- Networking
- Excitement!

name: Cloud Study Jam Mombasa

venue.name: Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology (MSA CBD)

description:
Our attendees will:
-Learn how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
- Train and deploy a tensorflow model Google Cloud ML
-Cloud ML Engine Qwik Start, Google Cloud Speech API,
-Get access to Qwiklabs.com, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
-Get Google-hosted badges for your online profiles, to show potential employers what they know about Cloud computing.

Requirements: Come with your laptops as sessions will be very hands-on.

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Viewing Party
description: TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for two days of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.
